title: Chess
summary: Study openings and tactics, play practice games, and teach someone else so you grow as a thoughtful chess player.

modules.title: Chess Goals
modules.prompt: Set two skill goals and one habit that will help you improve.

modules.title: Opening & Endgame Study
modules.instructions: Learn one opening and one endgame pattern. Record key moves and ideas in your own words.

modules.title: Tactics Research
modules.instructions: Solve at least five tactics puzzles from two sources. Note themes (fork, pin, mate) and success rate.

modules.title: Match Log
modules.instructions: Play or analyze 4+ games (online or in person). Log opponent/time control, result, and lesson learned.

modules.title: Teach Chess
modules.instructions: Coach a beginner or present a mini-lesson. Summarize what you taught and feedback received.

quiz.q: True/False: You can castle while in check.
What piece moves in an L-shape?
Name one example of good chess etiquette.
quiz.a: Examples: shake hands, say good game, no distracting opponent.
